TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRenderer extends System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn

summary.span: 当用户移动触笔时，会在图面上绘制墨迹。

span.span: Draws ink on a surface as the user moves the tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从 类继承，并允许在用户将鼠标指针与 tablet 笔或其他指针设备一起移动时向表面呈现墨迹。The class inherits from the class, and allows ink to be rendered to a surface as the user moves the mouse pointer with a tablet pen or other pointing device. 您可以使用在 自定义控件上动态呈现墨迹，或从继承 以便在启用墨迹的元素（如）上实时执行自定义呈现 。You can use the to dynamically render ink on a custom control, or inherit from to perform custom rendering in real time on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 当用户使用 tablet 笔输入墨迹时，动态呈现是在独立于应用程序的用户界面线程的线程上完成的。Dynamic rendering is done on a thread separate from the application's user interface thread when the user inputs ink with a tablet pen. 使用鼠标时，动态呈现是在 UI 线程上完成的。When a mouse is used, dynamic rendering is done on the UI thread. > [!NOTE] > 若要将此类作为 XAML 元素引用，必须将 CLR 命名空间映射到前缀，并使用该前缀限定 元素。In order to reference this class as a XAML element, you must map the CLR namespace to a prefix, and use that prefix to qualify the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类通常不在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加 到 。The following example demonstrates how to attach a to an . 若要创建动态呈现墨迹的控件，请参阅 [创建墨迹输入控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control). [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此属性通常不在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的 对象 。The following example demonstrates how to create a object for a . 在此示例中，动态呈现的墨迹与指定的属性相匹配 `inkDA` 。In this example, the dynamically rendered ink matches the properties specified by `inkDA`. 若要创建动态呈现墨迹的控件，请参阅 [创建墨迹输入控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control). summary.span: 墨迹的绘制是实时的，因此墨迹看起来就像从触笔或其他指针设备中“流”出来一样。

span.span: Draws the ink in real-time so it appears to "flow" from the tablet pen or other pointing device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法发生在笔线程上，因此最大程度地减少了此方法中的工作，以避免影响性能。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.

span.span: The current stylus device.

param.name: stylusPoints
param.span: 要重新绘制的触笔接触点。

span.span: The stylus points to be redrawn.

summary.span: 清除对当前笔画的呈现并重新绘制它。

span.span: Clears rendering on the current stroke and redraws it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新 绘制当前笔画和传递到方法中的任意触笔点 。The redraws the current stroke and any of the stylus points passed into the method. 此方法允许你在用户仍创建笔划时重绘笔画。This method allows you to redraw a stroke while the user is still creating the stroke. 在调用时，tablet 笔必须接触数字化仪，或必须按鼠标左键 。The tablet pen must be touching the digitizer or the left mouse button must be pressed when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例在绘制当前笔划时更改其颜色。The following example changes the color of the current stroke as it is being drawn. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#13)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#13)]

exception.span: 触笔或鼠标均未处于关闭状态。

span.span: Neither the stylus nor the mouse is in the down state.
